thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 22 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Universal Electronics Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.60

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Universal Electronics Reports Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.60
text:
Feb 22 (Reuters) - Universal Electronics Inc:
* UNIVERSAL ELECTRONICS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* SEES Q1 2018 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.13 TO $0.23 * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.60
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.19 * SEES Q1 2018 SALES $169 MILLION TO $177 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.60 TO $0.70
* Q4 SALES $181.2 MILLION VERSUS $160.5 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.60, REVENUE VIEW $175.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.66, REVENUE VIEW $171.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
